sentences.en: Could you possibly knock me up some scrambled eggs?
sentences.cn: 你能尽快给我弄个炒鸡蛋吗？

sentences.en: Find Bernie and get him to knock an agreement together.
sentences.cn: 找到伯尼，让他尽快拟好一份协议。

sentences.en: German cameras at knock-down prices flooded the British market.
sentences.cn: 德国产的廉价相机充斥着英国市场。

sentences.en: He got a nasty knock on the head.
sentences.cn: 他头部遭到重重一击。

sentences.en: He had many motives for wanting to knock off Yvonne.
sentences.cn: 他有很多杀伊冯娜的动机。

sentences.en: I knocked and knocked but nobody answered.
sentences.cn: 我把门敲了又敲，但无人回应。

sentences.en: I'm prepared to knock five hundred pounds off but no more.
sentences.cn: 我做好了降500英镑的打算,但不会再低了.

sentences.en: If I get this report finished I'll knock off early.
sentences.cn: 如果我写完这篇报告，我就会早点下班。

sentences.en: It manages to knock rents down to $1 per square foot.
sentences.cn: 成功地将租金降到每平方英尺1美元。

sentences.en: It's after five; let's knock off.
sentences.cn: 已经五点多了；下班吧

sentences.en: Knock at my window at eight o'clock and I'll be ready.
sentences.cn: 8点钟敲我的窗，我会准备好的。

sentences.en: knocked all the radios down 20 percent.
sentences.cn: 把所有的收音机都降价百分之二十

sentences.en: knocked herself out to be ready on time.
sentences.cn: 为了及时作好准备她竭尽全力

sentences.en: knocked off 12 pounds in a month.
sentences.cn: 一个月内体重减了12磅

sentences.en: knocked off a bank.
sentences.cn: 抢劫银行

sentences.en: knocked off work at noon.
sentences.cn: 中午暂停工作

sentences.en: knocking around Europe.
sentences.cn: 在欧洲游历

sentences.en: knocking off someone else's ideas.
sentences.cn: 抄袭别人的构想

sentences.en: knocks down $50 an hour.
sentences.cn: 每小时收入50美元

sentences.en: met to knock around some ideas.
sentences.cn: 聚在一起讨论一些问题

sentences.en: She knocked her head on a stone.
sentences.cn: 她的头碰到了石头上。

sentences.en: That author knocks off a book a year.
sentences.cn: 那位作者在一年内仓促完成了这本书

sentences.en: The market might abandon the stock, and knock down its price.
sentences.cn: 市场可能会抛售该股票，从而令其股价下跌。

sentences.en: The storm knocked out the telephones.
sentences.cn: 风暴使电话中断

sentences.en: There was a light knock at the door.
sentences.cn: 有人在轻轻地敲门。

sentences.en: They decided to knock the two rooms into one.
sentences.cn: 他们决定把两间屋子打通连成一间。

sentences.en: They heard a knock at the front door.
sentences.cn: 他们听到前门有人敲门。

sentences.en: They knock around on weekends in grubby sweaters and pants.
sentences.cn: 他们周末穿着邋遢的毛衫和裤子到处闲逛。

sentences.en: What they said was a real knock to my self-confidence.
sentences.cn: 他们的话是对我自信心的一次重大打击。

sentences.en: When we stop enjoying ourselves we'll knock it on the head.
sentences.cn: 等玩够了，我们就会结束。

words.tran_cn: 门环；敲击者；吹毛求疵的人

phrases.tran_cn: （摇把）反击，（活塞）逆行，（曲轴）反转；反座；回击，击退；使...大吃一惊
停止做；住口，别再讲下去了
【非正式用语】 翻印：复印或模仿，尤指在未经允许的情况下
敲木头，企求好运；吉人天相
【非正式用语】 尽心尽力：最大程度地努力或用尽（自己或别人的）力量
爆振传感器；进气流量传感器
(非正式)给某人留下深刻印象

phrases.phrase: knock someone into the middle of next week
knock something into a cocked hat

phrases.tran_cn: 仓促完成：很快或粗粗地制作或拼凑
&I{【多用于英国】} 用尽力气；精疲力竭

trans.tran_en: the sound of something hard hitting a hard surface

trans.tran_cn: 敲， 打； 碰撞， 撞击
trans.tran_en: to hit a door or window with your closed hand to attract the attention of the people inside

trans.tran_cn: 敲，碰，打通，把…撞击成（某个状态），打破，（心）怦怦跳，（膝盖）打哆嗦，发碰撞声，批评，打球
trans.tran_en: to hit a door or window with your closed hand to attract the attention of the people inside
to hit a door or window with your closed hand to attract the attention of the people inside
